mentioned_cpes: SIMATIC S7-1500 TM MFP - GNU/Linux subsystem
issue_name: Vulnerabilities in the additional GNU/Linux subsystem of the SIMATIC S7-1500 TM MFP V1.1

1.command: Only build and run applications from trusted sources
1.description: Ensure that all applications built and run on the system are from trusted sources to mitigate the risk of exploitation.
